unnormalised: Hey everyone, let’s talk trash! Seriously though, waste management in India is a HUGE environmental issue.
normalised: Hey everyone, let us talk trash! Seriously though, waste management in India is a huge environmental issue.

unnormalised: Remember that pile of garbage near Dadar station last week? Yeah, that’s just the tip of the iceberg. According to IIT-Delhi, our cities are generating insane amounts of waste daily, like over 150,000 tonnes!
normalised: Remember that pile of garbage near Dadar station last week? Yeah, that is just the tip of the iceberg. According to I I T-Delhi, our cities are generating insane amounts of waste daily, like over one hundred and fifty thousand tonnes!

unnormalised: And where's it all going? Mostly landfills, overflowing and polluting our groundwater. It's like that scene in "Gully Boy" but instead of dreams getting crushed, it's the environment.
normalised: And where is it all going? Mostly landfills, overflowing and polluting our groundwater. It is like that scene in "Gully Boy" but instead of dreams getting crushed, it is the environment.

unnormalised: The good news is, things are slowly changing. More focus on segregation at source, you know, separating your biodegradable and non-biodegradable waste.
normalised: The good news is, things are slowly changing. More focus on segregation at source, you know, separating your biodegradable and non-biodegradable waste.

unnormalised: Some cities are even experimenting with waste-to-energy plants. Imagine turning all that kachra into electricity!
normalised: Some cities are even experimenting with waste-to-energy plants. Imagine turning all that kachra into electricity!

unnormalised: But we all need to pitch in. Think twice before throwing away that plastic bottle – could you reuse it? Could it be recycled?
normalised: But we all need to pitch in. Think twice before throwing away that plastic bottle – could you reuse it? Could it be recycled?

unnormalised: Even small changes in our daily habits can make a big difference. So let's do our bit for a cleaner Bharat! We can't leave this mess for future generations. Let's make Swachh Bharat Abhiyan a real success.
normalised: Even small changes in our daily habits can make a big difference. So let us do our bit for a cleaner Bharat! We can not leave this mess for future generations. Let us make Swachh Bharat Abhiyan a real success.
